altTitles.th: ช่วงเวลาแห่งแสงสีทอง

description.en:
The series continues! with *Golden Time*, the second part of the *Light and Shadow Trilogy*.

Alex, the Duke Eli and Duchess Edna's eldest son, has accomplished brilliant achievements. But he doesn't want to be a frog in a well protected from dangers by his parents, thus he sets out on a journey to become a real king. While he gathers trustworthy companions, one by one, Alex begins to feel attracted to Kenny, an extroverted wandering young boy that joins the group by accident. It turns out that Kenny's real identity is Northia's Second Princess and Duke Frederick's wife. The joy of the meeting in another era, the love of the two would bring the burning fire of a great war.

---
**Note:** Daum, KakaoPage, Delitoon, and Kuaikan combine both *[Light and Shadow](https://mangadex.org/title/50705061-6fb6-4155-a4aa-f12c3d167f08/)* and *Golden Time* together on the same page.

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%9B%EA%B3%BC-%EA%B7%B8%EB%A6%BC%EC%9E%90-%EA%B3%A8%EB%93%A0%ED%83%80%EC%9E%84/2737), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=49314208)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [Lezhin](https://www.lezhinus.com/en/comic/goldentime), [TappyToon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/golden-time)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/1381/)
* [French / Français](http://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/ombresetlumieres)
* [German / Deutsch](https://www.delitoon.de/detail/dad_0010001)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Golden-Time/3356) (Expired)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.comico.in.th/titles/1889)
description.es:
¡La serie continúa! con “Golden Time”, Parte 2 de la *Trilogía de luz y sombra*. Alex el hijo mayor del Duque Eli y la Duquesa Edna, ha tenido logros brillantes. Pero no quiere ser una rana en el estanque protegido del peligro por sus padres, por lo que emprende un viaje para convertirse en un verdadero rey. Mientras reúne a sus hombres de confianza, uno por uno, Alexis comienza a sentirse atraído por Kenny, un extrovertido muchacho errante que se une por accidente al grupo. Resulta que la identidad del muchacho es en realidad la segunda princesa de Northia y la esposa del Duque Frederick. La alegría del reencuentro en otro tiempo, el amor de los dos atrae el fuego ardiente de una gran guerra.

---
**Note:** Daum, KakaoPage, Delitoon, and Kuaikan combine both *[Light and Shadow](https://mangadex.org/title/50705061-6fb6-4155-a4aa-f12c3d167f08/)* and *Golden Time* together on the same page.

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%9B%EA%B3%BC-%EA%B7%B8%EB%A6%BC%EC%9E%90-%EA%B3%A8%EB%93%A0%ED%83%80%EC%9E%84/2737), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=49314208)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [Lezhin](https://www.lezhinus.com/en/comic/goldentime), [TappyToon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/golden-time)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/1381/)

description.th:
เรื่องราวภาคต่อของ 'แสงและเงา' ... เมื่อ 'อเล็กซ์' รัชทายาทแห่งเอิลส์เวิลด์ผู้ถูกเลี้ยงดุจไข่ในหิน อยากหนีออกจากกรอบเพื่อเติบโต จนได้มาพบกับ 'เจสสิก้า' เจ้าหญิงแห่งนอสเอียน ผู้หลบหนีจากเบื้องหลังอันมืดมนเพื่อพบกับอิสระ

---
**Note:** Daum, KakaoPage, Delitoon, and Kuaikan combine both *[Light and Shadow](https://mangadex.org/title/50705061-6fb6-4155-a4aa-f12c3d167f08/)* and *Golden Time* together on the same page.

description.zh:
在海上之国的残忍生存法则下长大的公主，为了成为王而踏上历练之路的年轻王储。一场别有用心的出逃，一次伴随着惊险与刺激的浪漫相遇。航海从来都是勇敢者的游戏，王储&公主：“我会是最后的赢家！”

---
**Note:** Daum, KakaoPage, Delitoon, and Kuaikan combine both *[Light and Shadow](https://mangadex.org/title/50705061-6fb6-4155-a4aa-f12c3d167f08/)* and *Golden Time* together on the same page.
